TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WindowsServiceCredential extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于描述进行 Windows 身份验证时使用的服务凭据的属性。

span.span: Provides properties that describe the service credentials used for Windows authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供两种设置。This class provides two settings. 您可以将 属性设置为 `true`，以允许客户端匿名登录。You can use the property to allow the anonymous logon of clients by setting it to `true`. 然后，可以将 设置为 `Anonymous`，以避免将客户端的标识泄漏给服务。You can then avoid disclosing the client's identity to the service by setting to `Anonymous`. - 如果 属性设置为 `true`（默认设置），服务就可以确定客户端所属的 Windows 组。If the property is set to `true` (the default setting), the service can determine the Windows groups to which the client belongs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowAnonymousLogons { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowAnonymousLogons : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许匿名用户访问（仅适用于消息级安全性）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to allow anonymous users access (applies only to message-level security).

value.span: 如果允许匿名用户进行访问，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if anonymous users are allowed access; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在对绑定使用 Windows 客户端凭据时，默认情况下，系统不允许匿名访问。When using Windows client credentials on a binding, by default the system does not allow anonymous access. 这意味着只有经过身份验证的域或工作组用户可以访问系统。This means that only domain or workgroup authenticated users are allowed into the system. 但在某些情况下，未经身份验证的匿名用户也可以访问服务。However, in certain cases it is acceptable for anonymous, unauthenticated users to access the service. 在这种情况下，可以将此属性设置为 `true`，以允许匿名客户端调用服务。In this case you can set this property to `true` to allow anonymous clients to call the service. 如果服务允许匿名身份验证，则安全性要求会大幅度降低，因此，应小心使用此设置。A service that enables anonymous authentication is significantly loosening the security requirements, so this setting should be used with caution. 请注意，此属性不适用于传输安全情况，而只适用于基础绑定使用消息安全来保护消息的情况。Note that this property does not apply to transport security scenarios and applies only when message security is used by the underlying binding to secure the messages. 在使用 Windows 传输安全的情况下，此属性不适用。If Windows transport security is used, this property does not apply. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何获取此属性。The following code shows how to get this property. [!code-csharp[S_UEWindowsServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uewindowsservicecredential/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEWindowsServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uewindowsservicecredential/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IncludeWindowsGroups { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IncludeWindowsGroups : bool with get, set

[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示客户端所属的 Windows 组是否包含在安全上下文中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the Windows groups that a client belongs to are included in the security context.

value.span: 如果 Windows 组包含在安全上下文中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if Windows groups are included in the security context; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大多数情况下，了解用户所属的 Windows 组可为授权决定提供有用信息。In most scenarios, knowing which Windows groups users belong to provides useful information for authorization decisions. 但是，如果不需要 Windows 组，则将此属性设置为 `false` 可以通过避免全组声明填充提高性能。However, if the Windows groups are not required, setting this property to `false` can improve performance by avoiding a full-group claim population. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何获取此属性。The following code shows how to get this property. [!code-csharp[S_UEWindowsServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uewindowsservicecredential/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEWindowsServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uewindowsservicecredential/vb/source.vb#1)]
